verses.verse: And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH4150>, Concerning the feasts of the Lord <WH3068>, which you shall proclaim <WH7121> to be holy <WH6944> convocations <WH4744>, even these are my feasts <WH4150>.

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> shall work <WH4399> be done <WH6213>: but the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is the sabbath <WH7676> of rest <WH7677>, a holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>; you shall do <WH6213> no work <WH4399> in it it is the sabbath <WH7676> of the Lord <WH3068> in all your dwellings <WH4186>.
These are the feasts <WH4150> of the Lord <WH3068>, even holy <WH6944> convocations <WH4744>, which you shall proclaim <WH7121> in their seasons <WH4150>.
In the fourteenth <WH702> day of the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> at evening <WH6153> is the Lord <WH3068>'s passover <WH6453>.

And on the fifteenth <WH2568> day <WH3117> of the same month <WH2320> is the feast <WH2282> of unleavened bread <WH4682> unto the Lord <WH3068>: seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> you must eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682>.
In the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> you shall have an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>: you shall do <WH6213> no labor intensive <WH5656> work in it <WH4399>.

But you shall offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the Lord <WH3068> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>: in the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>: you shall do <WH6213> no labor intensive <WH5656> work in it <WH4399>.
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH935>, When you be come into the land <WH776> which I give <WH5414> unto you <WH7114>, and shall reap the harvest <WH7105> there <WH935>, then you shall bring a sheaf <WH6016> of the firstfruits <WH7225> of your harvest <WH7105> unto the priest <WH3548>:

And he shall wave <WH5130> the sheaf <WH6016> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>, to be accepted <WH7522> for you <WH4283>: on the next day after the sabbath <WH7676> the priest <WH3548> shall wave it <WH5130>.

And you shall offer <WH6213> that day <WH3117> when you wave <WH5130> the sheaf <WH6016> an he lamb <WH3532> without blemish <WH8549> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> for a burnt offering <WH5930> unto the Lord <WH3068>.

And the food offering <WH4503> there shall be two <WH8147> tenth deals <WH6241> of fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081>, an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the Lord <WH3068> for a sweet <WH5207> smell <WH7381>: and the drink offering <WH5262> there shall be of wine <WH3196>, the fourth <WH7243> part of an hin <WH1969>.

And you shall eat <WH398> neither bread <WH3899>, nor parched corn <WH7039>, nor green ears <WH3759>, until the same <WH6106> day <WH3117> that <WH5704> you have brought <WH935> an offering <WH7133> unto your God <WH430>: it shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> throughout your generations <WH1755> in all your dwellings <WH4186>.

And you shall count <WH5608> unto you from the next day <WH4283> after the sabbath <WH7676>, from the day <WH3117> that you brought <WH935> the sheaf <WH6016> of the wave offering <WH8573>; seven <WH7651> sabbaths <WH7676> shall be <WH1961> complete <WH8549>:

Even unto <WH5704> the next day <WH4283> after the seventh <WH7637> sabbath <WH7676> shall you number <WH5608> fifty <WH2572> days <WH3117>; and you shall offer <WH7126> a new <WH2319> food offering <WH4503> unto the Lord <WH3068>.

You shall bring out <WH935> of your habitations <WH4186> two <WH8147> wave <WH8573> loaves <WH3899> of two <WH8147> tenth deals <WH6241>: they shall be of fine flour <WH5560>; they shall be baked <WH644> with yeast <WH2557>; they are the firstfruits <WH1061> unto the Lord <WH3068>.

And you shall offer <WH7126> with the bread <WH3899> seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532> without blemish <WH8549> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141>, and one <WH259> young <WH1241> bullock <WH6499>, and two <WH8147> rams <WH352>: they shall be for a burnt offering <WH5930> unto the Lord <WH3068>, with their food offering <WH4503>, and their drink offerings <WH5262>, even an offering made by fire <WH801>, of sweet <WH5207> smell <WH7381> unto the Lord <WH3068>.

Then you shall sacrifice <WH6213> one <WH259> kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795> for a sin offering <WH2403>, and two <WH8147> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> for a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002>.

And the priest <WH3548> shall wave <WH5130> them with the bread <WH3899> of the firstfruits <WH1061> for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>, with the two <WH8147> lambs <WH3532>: they shall be holy <WH6944> to the Lord <WH3068> for the priest <WH3548>.

And you shall proclaim <WH7121> on the same <WH6106> day <WH3117>, that it may be an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744> unto you <WH6213>: you shall do no labor intensive <WH5656> work <WH4399> in it it shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> in all your dwellings <WH4186> throughout your generations <WH1755>.

And when you reap <WH7114> the harvest <WH7105> of your land <WH776>, you shall not make clean riddance <WH3615> of the corners <WH6285> of your field <WH7704> when you reapest <WH7114>, neither shall you gather <WH3950> any gleaning <WH3951> of your harvest <WH7105>: you shall leave <WH5800> them unto the poor <WH6041>, and to the stranger <WH1616>: I am the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>.
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, In the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320>, in the first <WH259> day of the month <WH2320>, shall you have a sabbath <WH7677>, a memorial <WH2146> of blowing <WH8643> of trumpets <WH6944>, an holy convocation <WH4744>.
You shall do <WH6213> no labor intensive <WH5656> work <WH4399> in it but you shall offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the Lord <WH3068>.
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Also <WH389> on the tenth <WH6218> day of this seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> there shall be a day <WH3117> of atonement <WH3725>: it shall be a holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744> unto you <WH6031>; and you shall afflict your souls <WH5315>, and offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the Lord <WH3068>.

And you shall do <WH6213> no work <WH4399> in that same <WH6106> day <WH3117>: for it is a day <WH3117> of atonement <WH3725>, to make an atonement <WH3722> for you before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>.
For whatever soul <WH5315> it be that shall not be afflicted <WH6031> in that same <WH6106> day <WH3117>, he shall be cut off <WH3772> from among his people <WH5971>.
And whatever soul <WH5315> it be that does <WH6213> any work <WH4399> in that same <WH6106> day <WH3117>, the same soul <WH5315> will I destroy <WH6> from among <WH7130> his people <WH5971>.
You shall do <WH6213> no manner of work <WH4399>: it shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> throughout your generations <WH1755> in all your dwellings <WH4186>.

It shall be unto you a sabbath <WH7676> of rest <WH7677>, and you shall afflict <WH6031> your souls <WH5315>: in the ninth <WH8672> day of the month <WH2320> at evening <WH6153>, from evening <WH6153> unto evening <WH6153>, shall you celebrate <WH7673> your sabbath <WH7676>.
And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, The fifteenth <WH2568> day <WH3117> of this seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> shall be the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521> for seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> unto the Lord <WH3068>.
On the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> shall be an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>: you shall do <WH6213> no labor intensive <WH5656> work in it <WH4399>.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> you shall offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the Lord <WH3068>: on the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> shall be an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744> unto you <WH7126>; and you shall offer an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the Lord <WH3068>: it is a solemn assembly <WH6116>; and you shall do <WH6213> no labor intensive <WH5656> work in it <WH4399>.

These are the feasts <WH4150> of the Lord <WH3068>, which you shall proclaim <WH7121> to be holy <WH6944> convocations <WH4744>, to offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the Lord <WH3068>, a burnt offering <WH5930>, and a food offering <WH4503>, a sacrifice <WH2077>, and drink offerings <WH5262>, every thing <WH1697> upon his <WH3117> day <WH3117>:

Beside the sabbaths <WH7676> of the Lord <WH3068>, and beside your gifts <WH4979>, and beside all your vows <WH5088>, and beside all your freewill offerings <WH5071>, which you give <WH5414> unto the Lord <WH3068>.

Also in the fifteenth <WH2568> day <WH3117> of the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320>, when you have gathered <WH622> in the fruit <WH8393> of the land <WH776>, you shall keep <WH2287> a feast <WH2282> unto the Lord <WH3068> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>: on the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> shall be a sabbath <WH7677>, and on the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> shall be a sabbath <WH7677>.

And you shall take <WH3947> you on the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> the fruit <WH6529> of good <WH1926> trees <WH6086>, branches <WH3709> of palm <WH8558> trees <WH6057>, and the boughs of thick <WH5687> trees <WH6086>, and willows <WH6155> of the brook <WH5158>; and you shall rejoice <WH8055> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>.

And you shall keep <WH2287> it a feast <WH2282> unto the Lord <WH3068> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> in the year <WH8141>. It shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> in your generations <WH1755>: you shall celebrate <WH2287> it in the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320>.
You shall live <WH3427> in shelters <WH5521> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>; all that are Israelites <WH3478> born <WH249> shall live <WH3427> in shelters <WH5521>:

That your generations <WH1755> may know <WH3045> that I made the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> to live <WH3427> in shelters <WH5521>, when I brought them out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: I am the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>.
And Moses <WH4872> declared <WH1696> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> the feasts <WH4150> of the Lord <WH3068>.
